Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.5 Saññojanasaññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 4.5.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasaññojanasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
114.
1604Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi…pe…  namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
